DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare accuracy measurement ultrasonography Cole formula predict uncuffed endotracheal tube diameter .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonography v Cole Formula Predict Endotracheal Tube Diameter
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine Universitas Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study . Non-invasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) monitor , ECG pulse-oximeter set subject operation room . The uncuffed endotracheal tube ( ETT ) diameter prediction measure firstly use ultrasonography ( USG ) , Cole formula . After , polyvinyl chloride ( Mallinckrodt ) ETT intubation Cole diameter measurement insert use direct laryngoscopy . If ETT small , use 0.5 mm big ETT prediction diameter , big , use 0.5 mm small ETT prediction diameter . Reintubation measurement use method record . If bradycardia desaturation happen , positive pressure ventilation , 100 % oxygen , atropine 0,01-0,02 mg/kg , adrenaline 0,01 mg/kg could give . Data analyze use SPSS use Bivariat Chi-square test Fisher Exact Test ( categorical comparative analytical study ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 16 year old , Malayan race , plan undergo elective surgery general anesthesia intubation Subjects ASA status III Cooperative subject Subjects whose parent sign informed consent Subjects allergies Ultrasonography jelly Subjects difficult airway Subjects mass neck area Subjects respiratory disease Subjects growth & development disorder Subjects malnutrition ( < 5 % percentile ) obesity ( > 95 % percentile ) . Drop criterion : Subjects cardiorespiratory disorder intubation Subjects fail intubated twice .
